rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming Scandinavian-style entrance with minimalistic design, clean lines and natural materials. Includes coat closet and seating area.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Functional servant's quarters designed for comfort and privacy. Features a small kitchenette and bathroom.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with large windows facing east to capture the morning light, aligning with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern dining area adjacent to the living room. Minimalist decor and efficient space utilization.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Scandinavian master bedroom with ample storage, en-suite bathroom with Vastu alignment (bathroom door facing north).

rooms.name: Kids' Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two small bedrooms for children, designed with safety and minimalistic Scandinavian aesthetics.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom to accommodate guests, featuring a private balcony.

openings.description: Large windows for natural lighting and cross ventilation.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Scandinavian home theater on the first floor featuring acoustic design, ambient lighting and comfortable seating.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Modern study area with ergonomic furniture, integrated bookshelves and quiet space for work.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two additional bedrooms for extended family or flexible use, designed with Scandinavian simplicity.

openings.description: Access to the rooftop terrace via a staircase with glass balustrades.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Spacious outdoor living area on the roof offering panoramic views, Scandinavian design with integrated seating and greenery.
